Klasse VulkanInstance

java.lang.Object
Kartoffel.Licht.Vulkan.VulkanInstance
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
AutoCloseable, VulkanFreeable
public class VulkanInstance extends Object implements VulkanFreeable
There is no global state in Vulkan and all per-application state is stored in a VkInstance object. Creating a VkInstance object initializes the Vulkan library and allows the application to pass information about itself to the implementation.
Siehe auch:
  • Initialization :: Vulkan Documentation Project

    VulkanInstance.VirtualDevice
    A virtual device is create of a (physical-)VulkanInstance.Device and specifies furthermore what you want to do.

  • Felddetails

    • VULKAN_API_VERSION_OVERWRITE

      public static int VULKAN_API_VERSION_OVERWRITE
      When creating a new VulkanInstance, the current API-version is used. If you ever wish to select a specific API-version, you can set it here. Default is '-1'

  • Methodendetails

    • calculateCardScore_GAME

      public static double calculateCardScore_GAME(VulkanInstance.Device d)
      Higher means presumably better performance
      Parameter:
      d - the device
      Gibt zurück:
      the score, higher means better suited

    • calculateCardScore_GUI

      public static double calculateCardScore_GUI(VulkanInstance.Device d)
      Higher means presumably better for GUI-applications, etc..
      Parameter:
      d - the device
      Gibt zurück:
      the score, higher means better suited

    • create

      public static VulkanInstance create(String engineName, int engineVersionMayor, int engineVersionMinor, int engineVersionPatch, String appName, int appVersionMayor, int appVersionMinor, int appVersionPatch, String... extensions)
      Creates a new VulkanInstance, which is the way you interact with Vulkan. The API-version is the instance-version. Set 'VulkanInstance.VULKAN_API_VERSION_OVERWRITE' to change that behavior. You should need only one VulkanInstance for your application.
      Parameter:
      engineName - the name of the Engine
      engineVersionMayor - mayor version
      engineVersionMinor - minor version
      engineVersionPatch - patch
      appName - name of the Application
      appVersionMayor - mayor version
      appVersionMinor - minor version
      appVersionPatch - patch
      extensions - requested extensions
      Gibt zurück:
      the newly created VulkanInstance

      public void free()
      Frees any resources held back by this VulkanInstance
